name: YouChooseBatmanAdventures
0:
”Alexa, open Batman Adventures”
”Alexa, play Batman Adventures”
”Alexa, open Batman Adventures and go to the Stories Menu”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: batman adventures
Developer Terms of Use
des: YOU CHOOSE: BATMAN ADVENTURES is a You Choose bundle from Capstone, powered by Earplay. This bundle features four action-packed, interactive stories, including The Terrible Trio, Super-Villain Smackdown!, The Joker's Dozen, and The Riddler's Ransom. With simple voice commands, you help Batman, the Dark Knight, solve crimes and take down his worst super-villains in a truly dynamic experience. The first story, The Terrible Trio is available to all users with the additional stories available with purchase or FreeTime Unlimited subscription.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
